answers.answer: Hello,Adult bed wetting can be due to acute anxiety and stress, diabetes,urinary tract infection,urinary tract stones,Bladder cancer,obstructive sleep apnea  and neurological disorders.If this was the first episode of bedwetting,then it can be due to anxiety and consumption of excessive fluids at night.If the repeat happens,then pls consult a urologist and get these possibilities ruled out.I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

question: Hi  I am a 54 year old female.. For the last 3-4 months I have been wetting the bed at night. Some nights it has happened twice.  I always go to the bathroom before I lay down and usualy again about 2hrs later.  Then about 1-3 hours later I wake up on my back with my legs bent in a puddle of urine. I get up and go to the bathroom again.  I have to change my bedding and clothes and go back to sleep.  Then again I wake up on my back with my legs bent and my bedding is soaked. This has been happening 3-6 times a week.
title: bed wetting
